name: What goes up...
description:
What goes up...

Behold the unbridled power of Gravity! 

In this 2d puzzle platformer, you will yield the ability of Gravity Switching to solve increasingly challenging levels. 

Created by a team of 2 for the Untitled Game Jam #32 with the theme Upside-Down 

CONTROLS:

Move Left: A or Left Arrow key 

Move Right: D or Right Arrow Key

Jump: Space Bar 

Gravity Switch: Q 

Pick up Object: E 

Pause Game: P
